name: .ADM File Extension
summary: Learn about .ADM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created when an Extensis Portfolio Catalog (.FDB file) is open in admin mode; should be automatically deleted when the Catalog is closed, but may be deleted manually if the file is not removed after closing the Catalog.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
